QAPair.Question: What is (are) Mallet finger - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: Mallet finger occurs when you cannot straighten your finger at its last joint. When you do try to straighten it, the tip of your finger remains bent toward your palm. Sports injuries are the most common cause of mallet finger, particularly from catching a ball.
